3.2.0.name: comlink
3.2.0.description: Comlink’s goal is to make [WebWorkers][webworker] enjoyable. Comlink removes the mental barrier of thinking about `postMessage` and hides the fact that you are working with workers.

scripts.test: npm run linter && npm run dtslint && npm run unittest && npm run build
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run compile
scripts.compile: tsc --outDir dist && tsc -m umd --outDir dist/umd && node ./mangle_umd.js

3.1.1.name: comlink
3.1.1.description: Comlink’s goal is to make [WebWorkers][webworker] enjoyable. Comlink removes the mental barrier of thinking about `postMessage` and hides the fact that you are working with workers.

scripts.test: npm run linter && npm run unittest && npm run build
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run compile
scripts.compile: tsc --outDir dist && tsc -m umd --outDir dist/umd && node ./mangle_umd.js

3.1.0.name: comlink
3.1.0.description: Comlink’s goal is to make [WebWorkers][webworker] enjoyable. Comlink removes the mental barrier of thinking about `postMessage` and hides the fact that you are working with workers.

scripts.test: npm run linter && npm run unittest && npm run build
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run compile
scripts.compile: tsc --outDir dist && tsc -m umd --outDir dist/umd && node ./mangle_umd.js

3.0.3.name: comlink
3.0.3.description: Comlink’s goal is to make [WebWorkers][webworker] enjoyable. Comlink removes the mental barrier of thinking about `postMessage` and hides the fact that you are working with workers.

scripts.test: npm run fmt_test && npm run unittest && npm run build
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist && sed -i.bak -e 's!comlinkjs"!comlink"!' dist/package.json && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run compile
scripts.compile: tsc --outDir dist && tsc -m umd --outDir dist/umd && node ./mangle_umd.js

3.0.2.name: comlink
3.0.2.description: Comlink’s goal is to make [WebWorkers][webworker] enjoyable. Comlink removes the mental barrier of thinking about `postMessage` and hides the fact that you are working with workers.

scripts.test: npm run linter && npm run unittest && npm run build
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run compile
scripts.compile: tsc --outDir dist && tsc -m umd --outDir dist/umd && node ./mangle_umd.js

2.3.6.name: comlink
2.3.6.description: Comlink’s goal is to make [WebWorkers][WebWorker] enjoyable. Comlink removes the mental barrier of thinking about `postMessage` and hides the fact that you are working with workers.

scripts.test: npm run linter && npm run unittest && npm run build
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist && sed -i.bak -e 's!"comlinkjs"!"comlink"!' dist/package.json && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run compile && npm run mangle_global && npm run minify
scripts.compile: tsc --outDir dist -m none && mv dist/comlink.{,global.}js && mv dist/messagechanneladapter.{,global.}js && tsc --outDir dist -m es2015 && mv dist/comlink.{,es6.}js && mv dist/messagechanneladapter.{,es6.}js && tsc -d --outDir dist -m umd && mv dist/comlink.{,umd.}js && mv dist/messagechanneladapter.{,umd.}js
scripts.mangle_global: sed -i.bak -e 's!exports.Comlink!self.Comlink!' dist/comlink.global.js && sed -i.bak 's!^.*"__esModule".*$!!' dist/comlink.global.js && sed -i.bak -e 's!exports.MessageChannelAdapter!self.MessageChannelAdapter!' dist/messagechanneladapter.global.js && sed -i.bak -e 's!^.*"__esModule".*$!!' dist/messagechanneladapter.global.js
scripts.minify: babel-minify --mangle -o dist/comlink.global.{min.,}js && babel-minify --mangle -o dist/comlink.es6.{min.,}js && babel-minify --mangle -o dist/comlink.umd.{min.,}js && babel-minify --mangle -o dist/messagechanneladapter.global.{min.,}js && babel-minify --mangle -o dist/messagechanneladapter.es6.{min.,}js && babel-minify --mangle -o dist/messagechanneladapter.umd.{min.,}js

0.0.1.name: comlink
0.0.1.description: Reliable and flexible RPC between a web browser and a node server.

scripts.test: node tests.js | tap-dot

scripts.test:types: tsc -p ./tests/tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run fmt_test && npm run build && npm run test:types && npm run test:unit
